CustomField.description: This will be stamped with last updated value of “Indirect Customer?” on the opportunity under the Organisation. “Indirect Customer?” on the Opportunity is a formula field based on the picklist value selection for “Has Ownership Over the Freight?” and “Has Control Over Lodgement Facility?”
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is derived from the most recent Opportunity created or updated
CustomField.label: Indirect Customer?
